welcome.name: Welcome
welcome.content:
[The Game Lobby](https://gamelobby.uray.gen.tr/)'s Brawl Stars API wrapper! - ✅ Easy to use - ✅ Feature-rich - ✅ [Has documentation avaible](https://gl-devdocs.uray.gen.tr/)
## How to install? * Install node.js. * Use `npm install gl-brawlstars` in your terminal. - ✅ It's intalled!
## How to use? * Create an api key on the [Brawl Stars API (click here)](https://developer.brawlstars.com/#/account) * Check out [the documentation (click here)](https://gl-devdocs.uray.gen.tr/)
## Have some examples! ```js const { Client } = require('gl-brawlstars'); const client = new Client({ token: 'your_token_here' }); client.players.get('#PLAYERTAG1').then(player => { console.log(`1) This player's called: ${player.name}`) }); client.clubs.get('#CLUBTAG2').then(club => { console.log(`2) This club's called: ${club.name}`) }); client.brawlers.find(16000000).then(brawler => { console.log(`3) This brawler's called: ${brawler.name}`) }); ```

classes.name: BattleLog
classes.description: A Brawl Stars player's battle log.Note: It may take up to 30 minutes for a new battle to appear in the `players/battlelog` endpoint.

params.name: client
params.description: The client that this player was fetched from

params.name: res
params.description: Api response

props.name: array
props.description: Returns the battle log as an array.

classes.name: Brawler
classes.description: A Brawl Stars brawler.

params.name: client
params.description: The client that this brawler was fetched from

params.name: res
params.description: Api response

classes.name: Client
classes.description: The Brawl Stars client, a starting point.

params.name: options
params.description: The options to be applied to this client

props.name: options
props.description: The options applied to this client

methods.name: fetchAPI
methods.description: Fetches an endpoint using this client.

params.name: apiUrl
params.description: The url for the api endpoint

classes.name: Club
classes.description: A Brawl Stars club.

params.name: client
params.description: The client that this club was fetched from

params.name: res
params.description: Api response

props.name: trophies
props.description: This club's trophy object, required and total trophy counts

props.name: isFull
props.description: Returns if this club has reached it's full capacity

classes.name: Player
classes.description: A Brawl Stars player.

params.name: client
params.description: The client that this player was fetched from

params.name: res
params.description: Api response

props.name: highestTrophies
props.description: This player's highest trophy count of all time.

props.name: experience
props.description: This player's experience object.* Note: This data does not update anymore.

props.name: bestRoboRumble
props.description: This player's best robo rumble level of all time.

props.name: abilityCount
props.description: This player's brawler's total ability counts.

classes.name: RankedPlayer
classes.description: A Brawl Stars player on the leaderboard.

params.name: client
params.description: The client that this ranking was fetched from

params.name: res
params.description: Api response

params.name: viaBrawler
params.description: If this player have ranked from a brawler

props.name: brawlerTrophies
props.description: This player's brawler's trophies, which is ranked on the leaderboard

props.name: rank

classes.name: RotatingEvent
classes.description: Brawl Stars's rotating event.

params.name: res
params.description: Api response

props.name: modifiers
props.description: This event's modifiers, if any avaible.

props.name: startTime
props.description: This event's ending time as a date object.

props.name: endTime
props.description: This event's ending time as a date object.

props.name: slot
props.description: This event's slot's id on the api.

classes.name: ApiError
classes.description: Represents an error from the Brawl Stars api

params.name: res
params.description: Fetched api response

params.name: body
params.description: Returned api body

classes.name: ClientError
classes.description: Client error handling for this package.

params.name: reason
params.description: Client error reason, listed in the `Messages.js` file

props.name: code
props.description: The error's code, which is listed in the `Messages.js` file

props.name: message
props.description: The error's message, which is listed in the `Messages.js` file

classes.name: TagResolver
classes.description: Resolves a player tag, either encode or decode.

methods.name: encode
methods.description: Encodes a player or club tag for an endpoint url.

params.name: tag
params.description: The player or club tag to encode

methods.name: decode
methods.description: Decodes a player or club tag. It also makes non encoded player or club tags {@link TagResolvable}.

params.name: tag
params.description: The player or club tag to decode

typedefs.name: BattleLogMatchEvent
typedefs.description: A match's event in a battle log.

props.name: id
props.description: This event's id on the api

props.name: mode
props.description: This event's (game) mode's name. Be aware: (Game) modes are returned by lower case first letter on the first word, but upper case first letter on the other words! Example: `soloShowdown`

props.name: map
props.description: This event's map that the match took place

typedefs.name: BattleResult
typedefs.description: A battle's result for a player. It can be:* `victory`* `defeat`* or `draw`

typedefs.name: BattlePlayerBrawler
typedefs.description: A battle's players' brawler object.

props.name: id
props.description: This brawler's id on the api

props.name: power
props.description: This brawler's power level on the player's (who is playing it's) account

props.name: trophies
props.description: This brawler's trophies before this match on the player's (who is playing it's) account

typedefs.name: BattleStarPlayer
typedefs.description: A battle's star player object.

props.name: brawler
props.description: The star player's used brawler for this match

typedefs.name: BattleLogMatchBattleInfo
typedefs.description: A match's battle info.

props.name: mode
props.description: This battle's (game) mode's name. Be aware: (Game) modes are returned by lower case first letter on the first word, but upper case first letter on the other words! Example: `soloShowdown`

props.name: type
props.description: This battle's ranking type. It might not be ranked

props.name: result
props.description: This battle's result for this player

props.name: trophyChange
props.description: This battle's change in trophies for this player

props.name: teams
props.description: This battle's teams. See {@link BattleLogMatchBattleInfo#players} for `soloShowdown`, `duels` etc.

props.name: players
props.description: This battle's players. See {@link BattleLogMatchBattleInfo#teams} for teamed events

typedefs.name: BattleLogMatch
typedefs.description: A match in a battle log.

props.name: battleTime
props.description: The time that the battle was played as an ISO string

props.name: event
props.description: The event that this match took place

props.name: battle
props.description: The battle info for this match

typedefs.name: BrawlerStarPower
typedefs.description: A brawler's star power object.

props.name: id
props.description: This star power's id on the api

typedefs.name: BrawlerGadget
typedefs.description: A brawler's gadget object.

props.name: id
props.description: This gadget's id on the api

typedefs.name: ClientOptions
typedefs.description: The options for a Brawl Stars client.

props.name: token
props.description: The token for this client, get it from https://developer.brawlstars.com/#/account

typedefs.name: ClubEntrance
typedefs.description: A club's entrance type. Can be:* `open`: Anyone can join this club* `inviteOnly`: Only invited people, or people who requested and accepted can join this club* `closed`: No one can join this club

typedefs.name: ClubTrophyObject
typedefs.description: A club's trophy object, required and total trophy counts

typedefs.name: ClubRole
typedefs.description: A role in the club for a club member* `notMember`* `member`* `senior`* `vicePresident`* `president`* `unknown`

typedefs.name: ClubMember
typedefs.description: A club's member

props.name: role
props.description: This member's role in this club

typedefs.name: PlayerNameColor
typedefs.description: A player's name color object.

props.name: android
props.description: Player's name color in android color code.

typedefs.name: PlayerExperience
typedefs.description: A player's experience object.

props.name: points
props.description: Player's all time total experience points.

typedefs.name: PlayerVictories
typedefs.description: A player's victories' object.

typedefs.name: PlayerBestSpecialEventLevel
typedefs.description: A player's best special event level of all time.

props.name: level
props.description: The best level this player have beat in this special event

props.name: id
props.description: The id of the level, which is the number api provides

props.name: insane
props.description: The insane level the player have beat, if they ever beat an insane level

props.name: levelsLeft
props.description: The number of levels left to beat insane 16 on this special event

typedefs.name: PlayerBrawlerGear
typedefs.description: A player's brawler's unlocked gear object.

props.name: id
props.description: This gear's id on the api

typedefs.name: PlayerBrawler
typedefs.description: A player's brawler object.

props.name: id
props.description: This brawler's id on the api

props.name: power
props.description: This brawler's power level on this player

props.name: rank
props.description: This brawler's trophy rank on this player

props.name: trophies
props.description: This brawler's current trophies on this player

props.name: highestTrophies
props.description: This brawler's highest trophies on this player

props.name: gears
props.description: This brawler's unlocked gears on this player

props.name: starPowers
props.description: This brawler's unlocked star powers on this player

props.name: gadgets
props.description: This brawler's unlocked gadgets on this player

typedefs.name: PlayerSeasonReset
typedefs.description: A player's season reset data.

props.name: trophies
props.description: This player's resetted trophy count at the season reset

props.name: starPoints
props.description: This player's star point reward at the season reset

typedefs.name: PlayerAbilityCount
typedefs.description: A player's brawler's total ability counts.

typedefs.name: EventModifier
typedefs.description: An event's modifiers, if any avaible. Can be:* `unknown` * `none` * `energyDrink` * `angryRobo` * `meteorShower` * `graveyardShift` * `healingMushrooms` * `bossFightRockets` * `takedownLasers` * `takedownChainLightning` * `takedownRockets` * `waves` * `hauntedBall` * `superCharge` * `fastBrawlers` * `showdown+` * `peekABoo` * `burningBall`

typedefs.name: EventDate
typedefs.description: A date object for an event.

props.name: iso
props.description: The ISO string for this date.

props.name: date
props.description: The date object for this date.

typedefs.name: TagResolvable
typedefs.description: A string which defines a player's or a club's in-game tag.It starts with `#`.It consist of one of these two (not including the starting character):* Only letters* Combination of numbers and letters

typedefs.name: URLTagResolvable
typedefs.description: A string which defines a player's or a club's in-game tag.It starts with `%23`.It consist of one of these two (not including the starting character):* Only letters* Combination of numbers and letters
